fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article about the Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine for Covid-19 said it had been “given to more than 43,500 people”. In fact, 43,538 people enrolled in the trial, with around half receiving the vaccine while the others were given a placebo (Will this vaccine enable us to return to a form of normality?, 14 November, page 15). • Other recently amended articles include: Europe’s Muslims are European. Stop outsourcing their plight to foreign leaders Australia’s newspaper ownership is among the most concentrated in the world Lennox: The Untold Story review – a ringside seat for the rise of a champ The Daily Mail has turned against the anti-vaxxers it used to champion Peace and goodwill to all (except pigeons): John Lewis spreads the love with its Christmas advert Farm worker given hospital order for strangling Devon writer A shadow pyramid and 6,000 geese: Friday’s best photos
